long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing a valuable church productivity tool for seamless texting from anywhere! Our powerful PastorsLine Google extension is designed to allow you to text any number from any website or send group texts within Planning Center and/or Push Pay CCB websites in the browser.  Sign up now to make texting your people and groups even easier.

1.  Integrated Texting Platforms:
* Send texts to individuals and groups effortlessly through our integrated platforms, like Planning Center (People Lists) and/or Pushpay/CCB (groups, saved searches or process queues), all from within your browser.
* Utilize PastorsLine to text any phone number directly from any website, without the need to switch applications.

2.  Streamlined Workflows:
* Reduce clicks and eliminate unnecessary steps in your daily tasks, making your work more efficient and productive. The app will resync your data and send the message for you. 
* You can group text lists that haven't previously been synced in PastorsLine with just two clicks, never leaving the app. 

3.  Secure and Reliable:
* Our extension is built with privacy and data protection as top priorities, ensuring your peace of mind.
* Rely on our stable and dependable infrastructure for uninterrupted communication and workflow management, allowing you to focus on what matters most.

Unlock the full potential of efficient communication and streamlined workflows with our feature-rich PastorsLine Google extension. Say goodbye to the hassle of juggling multiple applications and hello to a more productive way of working.

Take advantage of this opportunity to save time on routine tasks and gain more opportunities to minister to your people in person. Sign up today and start enjoying the benefits of our game-changing PastorsLine Google extension!
